sentences.en: And you should be good at English and can operate computer skillfully.
sentences.cn: 你要善于英文,并且能熟练使用电脑.

sentences.en: Have grasped the basic theories of the computer and application technology skillfully.
sentences.cn: 熟练掌握了计算机的基本理论与应用技术.

sentences.en: He controlled a meeting so skillfully that there was very rarely an outburst.
sentences.cn: 他掌握会议是如此熟练,极少发生感情冲动的事.

sentences.en: He has skillfully played that flute.
sentences.cn: 他熟练地吹奏了那笛子.

sentences.en: He skillfully fuses these fragments into a cohesive whole.
sentences.cn: 他巧妙地把这些片断合并成连贯的整体.

sentences.en: He tooled the jeep skillfully along the jungle path.
sentences.cn: 他沿着林中小路熟练地驾驶吉普车行进.

sentences.en: I believe he meant he was skiing skillfully, joyfully, peacefully, and confidently.
sentences.cn: 我想,他的意思是说他正在娴熟地 、 欢乐地 、 平静地和自信地滑雪.

sentences.en: If the wound is stitched up skillfully, it will hardly leave a mark.
sentences.cn: 如果伤口缝合得好, 不会落下什么伤疤.

sentences.en: Our own best tactical concepts, skillfully turned against us.
sentences.cn: 我们自己最精湛的战术概念, 被巧妙地运用了来反击我们.

sentences.en: She steered the car skillfully through the narrow streets.
sentences.cn: 她熟练地驾驶着汽车穿过狭窄的街道.

sentences.en: Skillfully placed lights throw the marble figures into clear relief.
sentences.cn: 巧妙配置的灯光把大理石雕像映衬得栩栩如生.

sentences.en: Skillfully use computers, toable to master OFFICE family of software.
sentences.cn: 熟练运用电脑, 能够掌握OFFICE系列软件.
这个公司的财务管理得很得法.

sentences.en: The skiers glided skillfully down the snow - covered slope.
sentences.cn: 那些滑雪者熟练地自覆盖着雪的斜坡上滑下.

sentences.en: The workers can manipulate the gears and levers of a machine skillfully.
sentences.cn: 工人们能熟练地操纵机件.
